name: operations-conductor-services
description: Operations Conductor solution services Lambda function package

scripts.build:clean: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build:copy: rsync -r --exclude=*.ts custom-resource/ssm/ build/custom-resource/ssm/ && rsync -r --exclude=*.ts tasks/ build/tasks/
scripts.build:lambda-edge: cp custom-resource/lambda-edge/index.js build/lambda-edge && cd build/lambda-edge && zip operations-conductor-lambda-edge.zip index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm install && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy && npm run build:zip
scripts.package: npm run build:clean && npm install && npm run build:ts && npm run build:copy && npm prune --production && npm run build:zip
